reviews.title: App sucks
reviews.comment: Bank charged me 35.00 fee for savings account because of a 30 cent draft on my account which put me negitive. Wouldn\'t even give me a break.
reviews.author: Jeff Hayden

reviews.title: Poor app
reviews.comment: The app is very poor times out its faster to use the Telebank if you want to know what your account is at
reviews.author: amanda kuhn

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I like that it has everything big so its easy to see, but more options within the app world be nice. I\'m just glad CCF finally got an app....thanks.
reviews.author: Lola Ruff
